mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.content, r.created_at, r.status FROM tbl_request r INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_request_id = m.id WHERE m.id = #{member_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT r.id, m.name AS member_name, r.content, r.created_at, r.status FROM tbl_request r INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_request_id = m.id where m.id = #{company_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT r.id, m.name, r.content, r.cost, r.location, r.time, r.status, r.created_at, r.updated_at, r.active, r.company_info_request_id, r.member_request_id, GROUP_CONCAT(c.name SEPARATOR ', ') FROM tbl_request r INNER JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_request_id = m.id INNER JOIN tbl_request_category rc ON r.id = rc.request_id INNER JOIN tbl_category c ON rc.category_id = c.id WHERE r.id = #{요청서_아이디};
